title: The Supplemental Elaboration of Clyde T. Barrow
description: There are horrific memories that haunt him, but they are not his horrific memories. There are terrible thoughts that move him, but they are not his terrible thoughts. They are lies. The truth is an unfathomable nightmare that brings with it the end of lies, the end of man.You know this story. Youâ€™ve simply forgotten how it all began.It starts, as always, with a choice.Turn the page.
author: Karolina Jones
